"+n.css3easing}f++}}if(u){if(n.duplicated){if(f>2){i.css("margin-top",n.direction=="up"?0:"-"+w+"px")}o={"margin-top":n.direction=="up"?"-"+w+"px":0}}else{A();o={"margin-top":n.direction=="up"?"-"+i.height()+"px":b+"px"}}}else{if(n.duplicated){if(f>2){i.css("margin-left",n.direction=="left"?0:"-"+a+"px")}o={"margin-left":n.direction=="left"?"-"+a+"px":0}}else{O();o={"margin-left":n.direction=="left"?"-"+a+"px":s+"px"}}}r.trigger("beforeStarting");if(c){i.css(T,N);var t=C+" { 100%  "+p(o)+"}",l=e("style");if(l.length!==0){l.filter(":last").append(t)}else{e("head").append("<style>"+t+"</style>")}h(i[0],"AnimationIteration",function(){r.trigger("finished")});h(i[0],"AnimationEnd",function(){M();r.trigger("finished")})}else{i.animate(o,n.duration,n.easing,function(){r.trigger("finished");if(n.pauseOnCycle){d()}else{M()}})}r.data("runningStatus","resumed")};r.bind("pause",v.pause);r.bind("resume",v.resume);if(n.pauseOnHover){r.bind("mouseenter mouseleave",v.toggle)}if(c&&n.allowCss3Support){M()}else{d()}})};e.fn.marquee.defaults={allowCss3Support:true,css3easing:"linear",easing:"linear",delayBeforeStart:1e3,direction:"left",duplicated:false,duration:5e3,gap:20,pauseOnCycle:false,pauseOnHover:false}})(jQuery);
</script>
<script>/*
 * jQuery Easing v1.3 - http://gsgd.co.uk/sandbox/jquery/easing/
 *
 * Uses the built in easing capabilities added In jQuery 1.1
 * to offer multiple easing options
 *
 * TERMS OF USE - jQuery Easing
 * 
 * Open source under the BSD License. 
 * 
 * Copyright © 2008 George McGinley Smith
 * All rights reserved.
 * 
 * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, 
 * are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
 * 
 * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list of 
 * conditions and the following disclaimer.
 * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list 
 * of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials 
 * provided with the distribution.
 * 
 * Neither the name of the author nor the names of contributors may be used to endorse 
 * or promote products derived from this software without specific prior written permission.
 * 
 * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY 
 * EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
 * MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
 *  COPYRIGHT OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL,
 *  EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE
 *  GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED 
 * AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
 *  NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED 
 * OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

// t: current time, b: begInnIng value, c: change In value, d: duration
jQuery.easing['jswing'] = jQuery.easing['swing'];

jQuery.extend( jQuery.easing,
{
	def: 'easeOutQuad',
	swing: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		//alert(jQuery.easing.default);
		return jQuery.easing[jQuery.easing.def](x, t, b, c, d);
	},
	easeInQuad: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c*(t/=d)*t + b;
	},
	easeOutQuad: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return -c *(t/=d)*(t-2) + b;
	},
	easeInOutQuad: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if ((t/=d/2) < 1) return c/2*t*t + b;
		return -c/2 * ((--t)*(t-2) - 1) + b;
	},
	easeInCubic: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c*(t/=d)*t*t + b;
	},
	easeOutCubic: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c*((t=t/d-1)*t*t + 1) + b;
	},
	easeInOutCubic: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if ((t/=d/2) < 1) return c/2*t*t*t + b;
		return c/2*((t-=2)*t*t + 2) + b;
	},
	easeInQuart: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c*(t/=d)*t*t*t + b;
	},
	easeOutQuart: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return -c * ((t=t/d-1)*t*t*t - 1) + b;
	},
	easeInOutQuart: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if ((t/=d/2) < 1) return c/2*t*t*t*t + b;
		return -c/2 * ((t-=2)*t*t*t - 2) + b;
	},
	easeInQuint: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c*(t/=d)*t*t*t*t + b;
	},
	easeOutQuint: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c*((t=t/d-1)*t*t*t*t + 1) + b;
	},
	easeInOutQuint: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if ((t/=d/2) < 1) return c/2*t*t*t*t*t + b;
		return c/2*((t-=2)*t*t*t*t + 2) + b;
	},
	easeInSine: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return -c * Math.cos(t/d * (Math.PI/2)) + c + b;
	},
	easeOutSine: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c * Math.sin(t/d * (Math.PI/2)) + b;
	},
	easeInOutSine: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return -c/2 * (Math.cos(Math.PI*t/d) - 1) + b;
	},
	easeInExpo: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return (t==0) ? b : c * Math.pow(2, 10 * (t/d - 1)) + b;
	},
	easeOutExpo: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return (t==d) ? b+c : c * (-Math.pow(2, -10 * t/d) + 1) + b;
	},
	easeInOutExpo: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if (t==0) return b;
		if (t==d) return b+c;
		if ((t/=d/2) < 1) return c/2 * Math.pow(2, 10 * (t - 1)) + b;
		return c/2 * (-Math.pow(2, -10 * --t) + 2) + b;
	},
	easeInCirc: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return -c * (Math.sqrt(1 - (t/=d)*t) - 1) + b;
	},
	easeOutCirc: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c * Math.sqrt(1 - (t=t/d-1)*t) + b;
	},
	easeInOutCirc: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if ((t/=d/2) < 1) return -c/2 * (Math.sqrt(1 - t*t) - 1) + b;
		return c/2 * (Math.sqrt(1 - (t-=2)*t) + 1) + b;
	},
	easeInElastic: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		var s=1.70158;var p=0;var a=c;
		if (t==0) return b;  if ((t/=d)==1) return b+c;  if (!p) p=d*.3;
		if (a < Math.abs(c)) { a=c; var s=p/4; }
		else var s = p/(2*Math.PI) * Math.asin (c/a);
		return -(a*Math.pow(2,10*(t-=1)) * Math.sin( (t*d-s)*(2*Math.PI)/p )) + b;
	},
	easeOutElastic: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		var s=1.70158;var p=0;var a=c;
		if (t==0) return b;  if ((t/=d)==1) return b+c;  if (!p) p=d*.3;
		if (a < Math.abs(c)) { a=c; var s=p/4; }
		else var s = p/(2*Math.PI) * Math.asin (c/a);
		return a*Math.pow(2,-10*t) * Math.sin( (t*d-s)*(2*Math.PI)/p ) + c + b;
	},
	easeInOutElastic: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		var s=1.70158;var p=0;var a=c;
		if (t==0) return b;  if ((t/=d/2)==2) return b+c;  if (!p) p=d*(.3*1.5);
		if (a < Math.abs(c)) { a=c; var s=p/4; }
		else var s = p/(2*Math.PI) * Math.asin (c/a);
		if (t < 1) return -.5*(a*Math.pow(2,10*(t-=1)) * Math.sin( (t*d-s)*(2*Math.PI)/p )) + b;
		return a*Math.pow(2,-10*(t-=1)) * Math.sin( (t*d-s)*(2*Math.PI)/p )*.5 + c + b;
	},
	easeInBack: function (x, t, b, c, d, s) {
		if (s == undefined) s = 1.70158;
		return c*(t/=d)*t*((s+1)*t - s) + b;
	},
	easeOutBack: function (x, t, b, c, d, s) {
		if (s == undefined) s = 1.70158;
		return c*((t=t/d-1)*t*((s+1)*t + s) + 1) + b;
	},
	easeInOutBack: function (x, t, b, c, d, s) {
		if (s == undefined) s = 1.70158; 
		if ((t/=d/2) < 1) return c/2*(t*t*(((s*=(1.525))+1)*t - s)) + b;
		return c/2*((t-=2)*t*(((s*=(1.525))+1)*t + s) + 2) + b;
	},
	easeInBounce: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		return c - jQuery.easing.easeOutBounce (x, d-t, 0, c, d) + b;
	},
	easeOutBounce: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if ((t/=d) < (1/2.75)) {
			return c*(7.5625*t*t) + b;
		} else if (t < (2/2.75)) {
			return c*(7.5625*(t-=(1.5/2.75))*t + .75) + b;
		} else if (t < (2.5/2.75)) {
			return c*(7.5625*(t-=(2.25/2.75))*t + .9375) + b;
		} else {
			return c*(7.5625*(t-=(2.625/2.75))*t + .984375) + b;
		}
	},
	easeInOutBounce: function (x, t, b, c, d) {
		if (t < d/2) return jQuery.easing.easeInBounce (x, t*2, 0, c, d) * .5 + b;
		return jQuery.easing.easeOutBounce (x, t*2-d, 0, c, d) * .5 + c*.5 + b;
	}
});

function isPersianDate(b){var a;if(0==b.search(/^\d+\-\d+\-\d+$/))a=b.split("-",3);else if(0==b.search(/^\d+\/\d+\/\d+$/))a=b.split("/",3);else if(0==b.search(/^\d{6}|\d{8}$/))a=[b.substr(0,b.length-4),b.substr(b.length-4,2),b.substr(b.length-2,2)];else if((a=b.match(/^(\d{2})(\d{2})$/))||(a=b.match(/^(\d{1,2})[/\-](\d{1,2})$/))||(a=b.match(/^(\d{1,2})$/)))b=new Date,b=gregorian_to_jd(b.getFullYear(),b.getMonth()+1,b.getDate()),b=jd_to_persian(b),a[0]=b[0],"undefined"==typeof a[2]&&(a[2]=b[1]),12>=

function gregorian_to_jd(b,a,c){return GREGORIAN_EPOCH-1+365*(b-1)+Math.floor((b-1)/4)+-Math.floor((b-1)/100)+Math.floor((b-1)/400)+Math.floor((367*a-362)/12+(2>=a?0:leap_gregorian(b)?-1:-2)+c)}function persianMonthDays(b,a){return 6>=a?31:11>=a?30:12==a?leap_persian(b)?30:29:0}if(!fdef(stopPropagation))var stopPropagation=function(b){b.stopPropagation?b.stopPropagation():b.cancelBubble=!0};if(!fdef(preventDefault))var preventDefault=function(b){b.preventDefault?b.preventDefault():b.returnValue=!1};

    function show_aftersuccess(pm) {

        $(".aftersuccess .work").text(pm);
        $(".aftersuccess").css('opacity', '.95');
        $(".aftersuccess").fadeIn(500);

        var timer = '';
        clearTimeout(timer);
        timer = setTimeout(function () {
            hide_aftersuccess();
        }, 4000);

    }


    function hide_aftererror() {
        $(".aftererror").fadeOut(800);

    }


    function hide_aftersuccess() {
        $(".aftersuccess").fadeOut(800);

    function ajax_start(sabad) {
        $(".tariki").show();
        $(".contain").show();
        if (sabad == 'sabad') {

            $('.sabad_loading').removeClass('fa-cart-plus').addClass('fa-spinner fa-spin');
        }

    }

    function ajax_end() {
        $(".tariki").fadeOut(600);
        $(".contain").fadeOut(600);
        $('.sabad_loading').removeClass('fa-spinner fa-spin').addClass('fa-cart-plus');
    }


    function get_data(act) {

        var k = 0;
        var data_nahaee = [];


        $('.mytag').each(function () {

            var data_id = $(this).attr('data-id');

            if ($(this).find('option').length == 0) {
                if ($(this).hasClass('btn-group') == false) {
                    var data = $(this).val();
                    data_nahaee.push({'name': 'd' + data_id, 'value': data});
                }

            }
            else {
                if ($(this).hasClass('btn-group') == false) {

                    var data = $(this).find('option:selected').val();
                    data_nahaee.push({'name': 'd' + data_id, 'value': data});
                }
            }

        })
        data_nahaee.push({'name': 'act', 'value': act});

        return data_nahaee;
    }


    function myajax(myurl, mydata, callback, typeofdata) {

        if (typeof(typeofdata) === 'undefined') typeofdata = "";
        $.ajax({

            url: myurl,
            type: 'POST',
            async: true,
            dataType: typeofdata,
            data: mydata,
            success: callback

        })

    }

    var nochange_tab = 0;

    function change_hash(newhash, nochange) {

        // alert(newhash);
        window.location.hash = newhash;

    }


    $(window).bind('hashchange', function () {

        /* if(typeof (nochange)=='undefined') {*/
        if (nochange_tab == 0) {
            change_tab();
        }
        /*}*/

    });


    function change_tab(act, data_send) {

        var data = [];
        var addhash = '';
        var arr_hash_now = '';
        var hash_now = window.location.hash;
        arr_hash_now = hash_now.split('/');

        if (typeof(act) == 'undefined') {

            act = arr_hash_now[0];

        }

        arr_hash_now.forEach(function (val) {

            var part1 = val.split('-')[0];
            var part2 = val.split('-')[1];
            data.push({'name': part1, 'value': part2});
        })


        convert_act_to_actionpage(act);

        $('title').text(action_title);
        end_change_tab = 1;


        //doclick(act,addhash);

        ajax_start();

        var callback = function (msg) {

            $('.change_tab_result').html(msg);
            ajax_end();
            after_load2();
            $('html,body').animate({'scrollTop': 0}, 600);
            //$('body,html').animate({'scrollTop':0},1000);


        };

        myajax(action_page, data, callback);


    }


    //alert('');


    function create_captcha() {

        $.ajax({

            url: 'captcha.php'


        })


            .done(function (msg) {

                $("#captcha").attr('src', 'captcha/' + msg + '.png');

                $("#captcha2").attr('src', 'captcha/' + msg + '.png');


            })

    }

    function refresh_captcha() {


        $("#captcha,#captcha2,#refresh_captcha").click(function () {

            $.ajax({

                url: 'captcha.php'

            })


                .done(function (msg) {

                    $("#captcha").attr('src', 'captcha/' + msg + '.png');

                    $("#captcha2").attr('src', 'captcha/' + msg + '.png');


                })

        })
    }


    function mark() {


        $(".mark,.mymark").unbind("click");

        $(".mark,.mymark").click(function () {


            if ($(this).hasClass('not_change')) {
            }
            else {
                if ($(this).hasClass('checkmark')) {
                    $(this).removeClass('checkmark');
                    $(this).addClass('uncheckmark');
                }
                else {

                    $(this).addClass('checkmark');
                    $(this).removeClass('uncheckmark');

                }
            }


        });
    }


    function convert_encode(str) {
        return encodeURIComponent(str);
    }


    function convert_decode(str) {

        var s = decodeURIComponent(str);
        s = s.replace(/\+/g, ' ');
        return s;

    }


</script>

<script>



    $.fn.toggle2classes = function(class1, class2){
        if( !class1 || !class2 )
            return this;

        return this.each(function(){
            var $elm = $(this);

            if( $elm.hasClass(class1) || $elm.hasClass(class2) )
                $elm.toggleClass(class1 +' '+ class2);

            else
                $elm.addClass(class1);
        });
    };

    $('.list_folders li').click(function(){

        var span_tag=$(this).find('span');
        span_tag.removeClass('m_bottom_red').removeClass('m_left_red');
        $(this).parent('ul').find(' > ul').slideToggle();
        $(this).find('.mosalas span').toggle2classes('m_left','m_bottom');

    });


    $('.list_folders li').click(function(){

        //$(this).removeClass('active_li');

        //$(this).toggleClass('active_li','none_active_li');

    });

    $('.mosalas').hover(function(){

        var span_tag=$(this).find('span');
        if(span_tag.hasClass('m_bottom')){
            span_tag.addClass('m_bottom_red');
        }else{
            span_tag.addClass('m_left_red');
        }

    },function(){

        var span_tag=$(this).find('span');
        span_tag.removeClass('m_bottom_red').removeClass('m_left_red');

    })

   /* $('.cat_link').hover(function(){
        $(this).parents('li').css('background','#5e140f');
        $(this).css('color','#fff');
    },function(){

        $(this).parents('li').css('background','#fff');
        $(this).css('color','#2e2e5e');
    })*/

    $('.cat_link2').hover(function(){
        $(this).css('background','#5e140f');
        $(this).css('color','#fff');
        $(this).find('a').css('color','#fff');
        $(this).find('i').css('color','#fff');
    },function(){

        $(this).css('background','#fff');
        $(this).css('color','#2e2e5e');
        $(this).find('a').css('color','#000');
        $(this).find('i').css('color','#1c541a');
    })

</script>

<div id="friends" class="col-xs-12">
<div class="col-xs-12">
<span class="frinds_span" style="background: #eee;padding: 3px;">
درباره کلیک سایت
</span>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-12">
کلیک سایت با گذشت سابقه بیش از 7 سال فعالیت در زمینه های مختلف آموزشی ، از جمله
<h2>
آموزش طراحی سایت
</h2>
<h2>
آموزش php
</h2>
<h2>
آموزش برنامه نویسی اندروید
</h2>
<h2>
آموزش سی شارپ
</h2>
و ده ها زمینه دیگر
هم اکنون به عنوان یکی از محبوب ترین سایت ها در زمینه ارائه آموزش های ویدویی شناخته می شود.
اگر قصد دارید به عنوان یک طراحی و برنامه ویس مشغول به کار شوید و از این راه کسب درآمد کنید به راحتی
می توانید با استفاده از
فیلمهای
<h2>
آموزش طراحی سایت
</h2>
و همچنین استفاده از خدمات پشتیبانی کلیک سایت به این هدف برسید.
اگر قصد دارید به عنوان یک برنامه نویس اندروید در زمینه ساخت اپلیکیشن اندروید فعالیت داشته باشید،
کلیک سایت
<h2>
آموزش برنامه نویسی اندروید
</h2>
را به صورت ویدئویی از صفر تا صد ارائه نموده است.
</div>
</div>
</div>

<script>


    $('.flipTimer').flipTimer({

        direction: 'down',
        date: '2018-03-18 23:59:59',
        callback: function () {
            $('.slider2_content_right').css('opacity', .4);
            $('.slider2_content_left').css('opacity', .4);
            $(".slider2_finished").fadeIn(200);
        }
    });


    var sliderTag2 = $('#slider2');
    var slideritemTags2 = sliderTag2.find('.itemTag');
    var numitemTags2 = slideritemTags2.length;
    var nextSlide2 = 1;
    var timeOut2 = 5000;
    var sliderNavigators2 = sliderTag2.find("#slider2_navigator ul li");

    function slider2() {


        if (nextSlide2 > numitemTags2) {
            nextSlide2 = 1;
        }

        if (nextSlide2 < 1) {
            nextSlide2 = numitemTags2;
        }

        slideritemTags2.fadeOut(0);
        slideritemTags2.eq(nextSlide2 - 1).fadeIn(100);
        sliderNavigators2.removeClass('active');
        sliderNavigators2.eq(nextSlide2 - 1).addClass('active');
        nextSlide2++;

    }

    slider2();
    var sliderInterval2 = setInterval(slider2, timeOut2);

    sliderTag2.mouseleave(function () {
        clearInterval(sliderInterval2);
        sliderInterval2 = setInterval(slider2, timeOut2);
    });


    function goToSlide2(index) {
        nextSlide2 = index;
        slider2();
    }

    $('#slider2 #slider2_navigator li').click(function () {

        clearInterval(sliderInterval2);
        var index = $(this).index();
        goToSlide2(index + 1);
    });

    /*slider2*/

</script>

    function tedadkol() {

        var number = 0;

        $(".shopping .basket").each(function (index, element) {

            number = number + 1;

        });

        $("#tedadkol").html(number);
    }


    function gheymatkol() {


        var number2 = 0;
        var price = 0;
        var totalprice = 0;


        $('.add_to_sabad_text').each(function () {

            $(this).text('افزودن به سبد');
            $(this).parents('.add_to_sabad_text_container').css('box-shadow', 'none');

        });
        $('.add_to_sabad_text_fasl').each(function () {

            $(this).text(' افزودن این فصل به سبد ');
            $(this).parents('.add_to_sabad_text_container').css('box-shadow', 'none');
        });

        $('.add_to_sabad_text_pack').each(function () {

            $(this).text(' افزودن کل مجموعه به سبد ');
            $(this).css('box-shadow', 'none');
            $(this).css('font-size', '13pt');

        });


        $(".shopping .basket").each(function (index, element) {

            number2 = 1;
            var id_file = $(this).attr('data-id-file');
            var id_fasl = $(this).attr('data-fasl');
            var is_pack = $(this).attr('data-pack');

            if (is_pack == 0) {
                $('.add_to_sabad_text' + id_file).each(function () {

                    $(this).text(' در سبد موجود است ');
                    $(this).parents('.add_to_sabad_text_container').css('box-shadow', '1px 1px 17px #d9ff2d');

                });
            }

            $('.add_to_sabad_id_pack' + id_file + '.add_to_sabad_text_fasl' + id_fasl).each(function () {

                $(this).text(' این فصل در سبد موجود است ');
                $(this).parents('.add_to_sabad_text_container').css('box-shadow', '1px 1px 17px #d9ff2d');

            });


            if (id_fasl == 0 && is_pack == 1) {
                $('.add_to_sabad_text_pack' + id_file).each(function () {

                    $(this).text(' کل مجموعه در سبد موجود است ');
                    $('.add_to_sabad_text_pack' + id_file).css('box-shadow', '1px 1px 17px #d9ff2d');
                    $('.add_to_sabad_text_pack' + id_file).css('font-size', '12pt');

                });
            }


            price = $(this).find('#gheymat').text();
            price = price.replaceAll(',', '');
            price = remove_empty(price);

            if (isNaN(parseInt(price))) {
                price = 0;
            }


            totalprice = totalprice + (parseInt(price));


        });


        $("#gheymatkol").html(seragham_number(totalprice));
        $(".gheymatkol_sabad").html(seragham_number(totalprice));


    }

    function addtosabad(id, elem, gheymat, title, pack, fasl, golden) {


        if (pack == 1 || golden == 1) {
            $('.not_show_again').hide();
        } else {
            $('.not_show_again').show();
        }

        if (not_show_again == 0 || pack == 1) {
            ajax_start('sabad');
        }
        $('.link_loading', elem).show();

        if (typeof(fasl) != 'undefined') {
            var fasl_number = fasl;
        } else {
            fasl_number = 0;
        }
        if (typeof(golden) != 'undefined') {
            var gold = golden;
        } else {
            gold = 0;
        }


        var data = {'idmahsool': id, 'pack': pack, 'act': 'addtosabad', 'fasl': fasl_number, 'golden': gold};

        var callback = function (msg) {

            //alert(msg);
            //console.log(msg);

            ajax_end();
            $('.shopping .inner_con2 ').html(msg);


            $('.link_loading', elem).hide();

            //alert('افزوده شد');
            tedadkol();
            //alert('افزوده شد');
            gheymatkol();
            //alert('افزوده شد');
            empty();


            /*seragham();*/

            if (typeof (calculate_gheymat_nahaee) == 'function') {
                calculate_gheymat_nahaee();
                calculate_takhfif_online();
            }


            if (not_show_again == 0 || pack == 1) {

                $(".modal-title2").text("با موفقیت به سبد خرید افزوده شد.");
                $(".modal-body-title").text(title);
                $("#myModal2").modal('show');
            }


        }

        myajax('sabad.php', data, callback);

    }//


    $('.not_show_again').click(function () {
        not_show_again = 1;
    });


    function popupwindow(url, title, w, h) {
        var left = (screen.width / 2) - (w / 2);
        var top = (screen.height / 2) - (h / 2) - 100;
        return window.open(url, title, 'toolbar=no, location=no, directories=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=no, resizable=yes, copyhistory=no, width=' + w + ', height=' + h + ', top=' + top + ', left=' + left);
    }

    function show_errors(elem) {

        $('.error_top').show();
        $("." + elem + "").show();
        $("." + elem + "").find('input').addClass('red');

    }


    function remove_empty(come) {

        come = come.replace(/\s+/, '');
        return come;
    }

    function remove_comma(str) {

        var str2 = str.replace(/,/g, "");
        str2 = parseFloat(str2);

        if (isNaN(str2) || str2 == '') {
            str2 = 0;
        }

        return str2;
    }

    $(".prevent_close").click(function (event) {

        event.stopPropagation();
    });


    function checknumber(e) {

        // Allow: backspace, delete, tab, escape, enter and .
        if ($.inArray(e.keyCode, [46, 8, 9, 27, 13, 110, 190]) !== -1 ||
            // Allow: Ctrl+A
            (e.keyCode == 65 && e.ctrlKey === true) ||
            // Allow: Ctrl+C
            (e.keyCode == 67 && e.ctrlKey === true) ||
            // Allow: Ctrl+X
            (e.keyCode == 88 && e.ctrlKey === true) ||
            // Allow: home, end, left, right
            (e.keyCode >= 35 && e.keyCode <= 39)) {
            // let it happen, don't do anything
            return;
        }
        // Ensure that it is a number and stop the keypress
        if ((e.shiftKey || (e.keyCode < 48 || e.keyCode > 57)) && (e.keyCode < 96 || e.keyCode > 105)) {
            e.preventDefault();
        }
    }


    function check_captcha(tag_input) {

        if (typeof(tag_input) == 'undefined') {
            var captcha = $('input[name=captcha]').val();
        } else {
            var captcha = $('input[name=captcha_input2]').val();

        }

        ajax_start();

        $.ajax({

            url: 'checkcaptcha.php',
            type: 'POST',
            async: false,
            data: {captcha: captcha}

        })//ajax
            .done(function (msg) {


                if (msg == 1) {
                    error = 1;
                    $("input[name=captcha]").addClass('red');


                    $.ajax({

                        url: 'captcha.php'

                    })

                        .done(function (msg) {

                            $("#captcha").attr('src', 'captcha/' + msg + '.png');

                            $("#captcha2").attr('src', 'captcha/' + msg + '.png');

                        })
                }//if

                if (error == 1) {
                    ajax_end();

                    show_aftererror(' کد امنیتی اشتباه است ');
                }


            })//done


    }


    function check_regexp(tag) {

        if (typeof(tag) == 'undefined' || tag == '') {
            tag = 'check';
        }

        //alert(tag);

        $("input." + tag + ",select." + tag + ",textarea." + tag + "").each(function () {

            if ($(this).css('display') != 'none') {


                var regexp2 = new RegExp($(this).attr('data-regexp'));
                var len = $(this).attr('data-len');
                /*alert(len);*/
                /*alert(regexp.test(x));*/
                var x = $(this).val();

                if ($(this).find('option').length > 0) {
                    var x = $(this).find('option:selected').val();

                }

                var y = x.replace(/\s+/, '');
                if (x.indexOf(',') != -1) {
                    x = x.replaceAll(',', '');
                    x = parseFloat(x);
                }

                /*if(len==undefined){alert('undefined');}*/

                /*regexp=/.{3,}/;*/

                if (regexp2.test(x) == true && (y.length >= len || len == undefined  )) {
                    $(this).removeClass('red');

                    $(this).parents('.select_tag_container').find('.dropdown-toggle').removeClass('red');

                }

                else {
                    $(this).addClass('red');
                    //alert(len);
                    $(this).parents('.select_tag_container').find('.dropdown-toggle').addClass('red');
                    error = 1;
                }


            }//agar none nist


        })


    }


    function show_aftererror(pm) {
        if (typeof (pm) == "undefined") var pm = '';
        $(".aftererror .work").text(pm);
        $(".aftererror").css('opacity', '.95');
        $(".aftererror").fadeIn(500);

        var timer2 = '';
        clearTimeout(timer2);
        timer2 = setTimeout(function () {
            hide_aftererror();
        }, 4000);

    }


    function hide_afterwarning() {
        $(".afterwarning").fadeOut(800);

    }


    function show_afterwarning(pm) {
        $(".afterwarning .work").text(pm);
        $(".afterwarning").css('opacity', '.95');
        $(".afterwarning").fadeIn(500);

        var timer3 = '';
        clearTimeout(timer3);
        timer3 = setTimeout(function () {
            hide_afterwarning();
        }, 4000);

    }


    $('.aftersuccess,.aftererror,.afterwarning').click(function () {
        $(this).hide();

    })


    function remove_empty(come) {

        come = come.replace(/\s+/, '');
        return come;
    }


    function get_page_number_hash() {

        var data = [];
        var addhash = '';
        var arr_hash_now = '';
        var hash_now = window.location.hash;
        arr_hash_now = hash_now.split('/');
        var page = 1;

        arr_hash_now.forEach(function (val) {
            var part1 = val.split('-')[0];
            var part2 = val.split('-')[1];

            if (part1 == 'page') {
                page = part2;
            }
        })

        return page;
    }
    ;


    function sabad_loader() {
        $('.sabad_loading').removeClass('fa-cart-plus').addClass('fa-spinner fa-spin');
    }
    sabad_loader();


    $('.navbar-nav li').hover(function () {

            id_menu = $(this).attr('data-id');
            len_menu = $(this).find('.caret').length > 0;
            clearTimeout(timer_close);//vase vaghti inke ba harkat az li be li digar undermenu baste nashavad
            clearTimeout(timer_delay);

            if (len_menu > 0) {
                timer_delay = setTimeout(function () {
                    $('.under_menu').fadeOut(0);
                    $('.under_menu_parent').slideDown(300);


                    $('.under_menu' + id_menu).fadeIn(300);
                }, 300)
            }

            else {
                timer_close = setTimeout(function () {
                    $('.under_menu_parent').slideUp(300);
                    $('.under_menu' + id_menu).fadeOut(300);
                }, 1000);
            }

        },

        function () {

            clearTimeout(timer_delay);
            clearTimeout(timer_close);


            timer_close = setTimeout(function () {
                $('.under_menu_parent').slideUp(300);
                $('.under_menu' + id_menu).fadeOut(300);
            }, 1000);


        });


    $('.under_menu_parent').hover(function () {

        clearTimeout(timer_close);


    }, function () {

        timer_close = setTimeout(function () {
            $('.under_menu_parent').slideUp(300);
        }, 1000);
    })

    function refresh_sabad() {

        $('.sabad_loading').removeClass('fa-cart-plus').addClass('fa-spinner fa-spin');

        var callback = function (msg) {
            //alert(msg);
            $('.sabad_loading').removeClass('fa-spinner fa-spin').addClass('fa-cart-plus');

            tedadkol();
            gheymatkol();
            empty();
            seragham();
        };
        var data = {};
        myajax('/sabad.php', data, callback);

    }

<script>


    String.prototype.replaceAll = function (find, replace) {
        var str = this;
        return str.replace(new RegExp(find, 'g'), replace);
    };

    function format(n, currency) {
        return currency + " " + n.toFixed(0).replace(/./g, function (c, i, a) {
                return i > 0 && c !== "." && (a.length - i) % 3 === 0 ? "," + c : c;
            });
    }


    function seragham() {


    }


    function seragham_number(y) {

        var y2 = y;
        y2 = y2.toString();

        y2 = y2.trim();
        y2 = y2.replaceAll(',', '');

        if (y2.length > 3) {
            y2 = parseFloat(y2);
            y2 = format(y2, '');

        }
        return y2;

    }

    function number_format(tag) {

        var mablagh = $(tag).val();
        mablagh = seragham_number(mablagh);
        $(tag).val(mablagh);

    }


    function remove_skill(tag) {
        $(tag).remove();
    }

    function add_to_list(tag, title, id) {

        $(tag).append('<a style="position:relative;" class="skills expert btn btn-success" onclick="remove_skill(this);" data-id="' + id + '" id="skill' + id + '">' + title + '<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove"></span></a>');

        $(tag).parents('.show_list').find('input').val('');

    }


    function add_to_list_one(tag, title, id) {

        $(tag).html('<a style="position:relative;" class="skills expert btn btn-success" onclick="remove_skill(this);" data-id="' + id + '" id="skill' + id + '">' + title + '<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove"></span></a>');

        $(tag).parents('.show_list').find('input').val('');

    }

    function takmil_sefaresh(downloadi_posti) {

        if (downloadi_posti == 'downloadi') {
            downloadi_or_posti = 0;
            $('#only_download').show();
        }
        if (downloadi_posti == 'posti') {
            downloadi_or_posti = 1;
            $('#only_download').hide();
        }

        var kol = $("#gheymatkol").text();
        kol = remove_comma(kol);
        kol = parseInt(kol);
        //alert(kol);

        if (kol > 100) {
            $("#myModal5").modal('show');
        }
        else {

            $(".modal-title").text("مبلغ کل خرید کافی نیست!");
            $(".modal-body-title").text("حدقل میزان خرید 1000 تومان می باشد.");
            $("#myModal4").modal('show');

        }
        ;

    }

    function isEmpty(str) {
        return (!str || 0 == str.length || !str.trim());
    }

    function before_sbm(register) {

        error = 0;
        $('.error_top').hide();
        $('.check_robot').val('no_robot_checked');

        if (register == 1) {


            check_regexp('before_payment');
            if (error == 1) {
                show_aftererror(' لطفا همه موارد را تکمیل کنید ');

            }


            var callback = function (msg) {

                //alert(msg);
                var error2 = 0;
                ajax_end();

                $(".error_email1").hide();
                $(".error_mobile1").hide();
                $(".error_username1").hide();
                $(".error_top").hide();

                //alert(msg);


                if (msg.trim() == "done") {

                    show_aftersuccess(' ثبت نام انجام شد ');

                    if (downloadi_or_posti == 0) {
                        $('#submit_reg').text('در حال انتقال به درگاه...');
                        $('#frm_sabt').submit();
                    }//downloadi
                    else {
                        window.location = 'layout.php?act=posti_tasvie';

                    }//posti

                }
                if (msg.trim().indexOf("email_tekrari") > -1) {
                    $(".error_email1").show();
                    $(".error_top").show();
                    error2 = 1;

                }
                if (msg.trim().indexOf("mobile_tekrari") > -1) {
                    $(".error_mobile1").show();
                }
                if (msg.trim().indexOf("username_tekrari") > -1) {
                    $(".error_top").show();
                    $(".error_username1").show();
                    error2 = 1;
                }

                if (msg.trim().indexOf("captcha") > -1) {
                    show_aftererror('کد امنیتی را مجددا وارد کنید');
                    create_captcha();
                    ajax_end();
                }


            };
            var email = $('.reg_email').val();
            var password = $('.reg_password').val();
            var family = $('.reg_family').val();

            var frm = {
                'd1': family,
                'd2': password,
                'd3': email,
                'act': 'register',
                'dmobile': ''
            };

            if (error == 0) {
                ajax_start();
                myajax('action.php', frm, callback);
            }

        }//agar sabtenam ast
        //agar login ast:
        else if (register == 2) {

            var callback = function (msg) {
                //alert(msg);
                ajax_end();
                msg = msg.trim();
                //alert(msg);
                if (msg == 1) {
                    show_aftersuccess(' ورود موفقیت آمیز ');
                    if (downloadi_or_posti == 0) {

                        $('#submit_login').text('در حال انتقال به درگاه... ');
                        $('#frm_sabt').submit();
                    }//downloadi
                    else {
                        window.location = 'layout.php?act=posti_tasvie';

                    }//posti
                }

                else if (msg == 0) {
                    show_aftererror(' نام کاربری یا رمز عبور اشتباه است ');
                    ajax_end();
                } else if (msg == 'captcha') {
                    show_aftererror('کد امنیتی را مجددا وارد کنید');
                    create_captcha();
                    ajax_end();
                }
            };

            check_regexp('login_beforepay');

            var user = $('input[name=reg_username]').val();
            var pass = $('input[name=reg_password]').val();
            var captcha = $('input[name=captcha_input2]').val();
            //var remember = 0;


            var data = {
                'act': 'login',
                'username': user,
                'password': pass,
                'captcha': captcha,
                'human': 'human',
                'remember': ''
            };


            if (error == 0) {
                //check_captcha('check_captcha2');
                /*ajax_start();*/
                /*alert(error);*/

                if (error == 0) {
                    ajax_start();
                    myajax('action.php', data, callback);
                }
            }
        }//agar login ast

        //agar hich kodam nist
        else {

            if (downloadi_or_posti == 0) {
                $('#frm_sabt').submit();
            }//downloadi
            else {
                window.location = 'layout.php?act=posti_tasvie';

            }//posti

        }


    }

    })


    function deletesabad(id, tag, golden) {


        //ajax_start('sabad');
        if (typeof (golden) == 'undefined') {
            golden = '';
        }

        var data = {'id': id, 'act': 'deletesabad', 'golden': golden};

        var callback = function (msg) {
            ajax_end('sabad');

            $('.shopping .inner_con2 ').html(msg);
            tedadkol();
            gheymatkol();
            empty();


            show_afterwarning(' محصول از سبد حذف گردید ');


            var length = $(".shopping .basket ").length;
            if (length < 1) {
                $(".shopping").slideUp(400);

            }

            if (typeof (calculate_gheymat_nahaee) == 'function') {
                /*alert('');*/
                calculate_gheymat_nahaee();
                calculate_takhfif_online();
            }


            if (typeof(tag) != 'undefined') {
                $(tag).parents('tr').remove();

                var i = 0;

                $('.table_sabad tr').each(function () {

                    $(this).find('.radif').html(i);
                    i++;
                })

            }

        };

        myajax('sabad.php', data, callback);

    }
